name: Doodle Cavern
description: Welcome to Doodle Cavern! A simple, turn based roguelike in a hand-drawn style with addictive gameplay! This is just a demo of the first 10 floors with 2 bosses. The full game will have at least 50 different floors, multiple difficulty modes, and unlockable trophies that give upgrades when starting a new game. If you find any glitches or have any suggestions, please let me know! The full game will be released for mobile soon!
